original_title: Ancient Evidence: Mysteries of the Old Testament
overview: In this Old Testament mystery, the "Ancient Evidence" team of researchers investigates the biblical story of Joseph, a man beloved by his father but resented by his jealous brothers. At a time when Semites and Egyptians were sworn enemies, Joseph, a lowly Israelist slave, rose to the rank of governor -- a position second only in influence and power to the Pharaoh himself.
title: Ancient Evidence: Mysteries of the Old Testament
